title: PC.Video.Converter.Studio.5.3-MKDEV.TEAM
description:
PC.Video.Converter.Studio.5.3-MKDEV.TEAM

INSTALL USE THE SERIAL IN THE NFO

ENJOY AND SEED  


Converting video files between AVI, MPEG, VCD, SVCD, DVD, WMV, MOV, 3GP, M4V, MP4, iPod

PC Video Converter Studio is an application that will help you convert video files between AVI, MPEG1, MPEG2, VCD, SVCD, DVD, WMV, and ASF formats.

The main features include: Batch convert all supported formats to AVI, MPEG, VCD, SVCD, DVD, and WMV formats. Support different AVI video Codec. NTSC/PAL setting options for VCD, SVCD, and DVD exporting. Change the video size, frame rate, and bit rate as you like.

Very user friendly interface and easy to use. Quick in conversion speed and no quality loss. Once you get started you will be surprised at how simply it is to convert video files.
